title: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit contributes to Business Roundtable's 2012 sustainability report
summary: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit recently contributed to Business Roundtable's fifth sustainability report, "Create, Grow, Sustain", which features stories from CEOs on how their companies are innovatively addressing sustainability, job creation and the growth of the U.S. economy.
